snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire, recovering from a back ailment, could rejoin the Knicks on Wednesday against the Nets. Stoudemire will still be a starter, Coach Mike Woodson said.
abstract: Amar’e Stoudemire, recovering from a back ailment, could rejoin the Knicks on Wednesday against the Nets. Stoudemire will still be a starter, Coach Mike Woodson said.

headline.main: Stoudemire Is Hitting His Stride in Practice
headline.print_headline: Stoudemire Is Hitting His Stride In Practice
